name: The Beatles A-sides Quiz | Songs by The Beatles | 15 Questions

questions.text: Released in March 1964 B-side was 'You Can't Do That' What is the A-side?
Released in August 1968 B-side was 'Revolution' What is the A-side?
Released January 1962 B-side was 'The Saints' What is the A-side?
questions.explanation:
'My Bonnie'.

	This one is credited to "Tony Sheridan and the Beatles".

questions.text: Released in August 1966 B-side was 'Eleanor Rigby' What was the A-side?

Released in October 1962 B-side was 'P.S. I Love You' What was the A-side?
Released in February 1967 B-side 'Strawberry Fields Forever' What was the A-side?

options: 'You've Got To Hide Your Love Away'
